title: varam aruLvAi parabhakti
sahitya:
varam aruLvAi parabhakti sheyya vakuLAbharaNar vAzhttum deivamE


anupallavi

  nara jIvanum amara jIvanAgi nAdavindu kalAtIta nilai peravE


caraNam    shuddha saccidAnanda sokkilE turiyAnubhava gaganattilE
attait-tinrangE aduvAgi nirkkum citta nilai tA tEjOnmayanE
